title: Women in the Workplace Can Learn From Machiavelli, With Stacey Vanek Smith
description: Journalist Stacey Vanek Smith, co-host of NPR’s The Indicator from Planet Money, joins Nora and Scott to discuss her new book, Machiavelli for Women: Defend Your Worth, Grow Your Ambition, and Win the Workplace, and applies a modern twist on principles from Machiavelli's writings. She also offers practical, real-life advice on how women can shatter the proverbial glass ceiling.
itunes:title: Women in the Workplace Can Learn From Machiavelli, With Stacey Vanek Smith
itunes:author: Morning Brew
itunes:subtitle: 16th-century hot takes from "The Prince" can help women overcome inequity at work?

She also offers practical, real-life advice on how women can shatter the proverbial glass ceiling.
